content.text: Are you a Data Engineer looking for new challenges?
At Ceibo we are looking for you! We continue to grow and we are looking to add a Data Engineer to our team to work on global projects.
Responsibilities:

items: Manage and prepare data for use
Analyze and process data, and ensure optimal performance of data and analytics systems
Work with different data sources and create ways to extract data from the sources, as well as import and modify it to suit the needs of the organization.

content.text: Requirements:

items: Two years of previous experience as a data engineer
Graduate or undergraduate degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related field
Database management (Postgress, Oracle, MSSQL, Mongo, MySQL, etc)
Experience working with Data Lakes and Data Warehouses

Are you a Full Stack Senior Developer and are you looking for new challenges?
At Ceibo Digital we are looking for you! ðŸ™Œ
Responsibilities
As a Full Stack Senior Developer you will be part of innovative, high impact, challenging and agile projects, being responsible for:

items: Actively participate in all phases of the software development lifecycle
Participate in the development and implementation of new products
Collaborate in the design of solutions at backend and frontend level
Build code complying with standards and quality requirements
Work with integrations to other systems
Perform peer code reviews and technical documentation

content.text: Requirements:
We are in search of an experienced Senior Full Stack Developer who meets most of the technical requirements listed below:
